GSD.product_version: versions from v3.6 to before v5.10.156
GSD.description:
xen/pcpu: fix possible memory leak in register_pcpu()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.156 by commit bb9924a6edd9d4a9ef83a5f337af60f8a7a68f98, it was introduced in version v3.6 by commit f65c9bb3fb725551d3e405f4d092caf24929cebe. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: xen/pcpu: fix possible memory leak in register_pcpu()
